title: Patty Striker // 183
description:
In 2000, a 35-year-old winery owner was found murdered in her A-frame tasting room. Was her murder connected to the killing of another winery owner just two months prior? Or was this a separate tragedy? Police would find out after something unthinkable happened 14 years later. This is the story of Patty Striker.
BONUS EPISODES
patreon.com/goingwestpodcast
